byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

abstract: Corruption investigation into New York State Senate Republican Majority Leader Dean G Skelos provides glimpse into seamier side of politics, power and real estate in New York; complaint details how Skelos pressed executive at Glenwood Management to direct business to his son, Adam, saying he would punish those who did not show support; case demonstrates how relationships can go beyond mere campaigning to extortion and bribery.
lead_paragraph: The corruption accusations against the two state legislators provide a glimpse into the seamier side of politics, power and real estate.

headline.main: Big Names in New York Real Estate Figure Into Skelos and Silver Cases
headline.print_headline: Big Names in Real Estate Figure Into Skelos and Silver Cases

snippet: The corruption accusations against the two state legislators provide a glimpse into the seamier side of politics, power and real estate.
